On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will continue our discussion of Hillary Clinton’s health scare and her “basket of deplorables” comment about Donald Trump’s supporters.

National Review’s John Fund will discuss his recent Wall Street Journal op-ed warning about the danger of allowing the Obama administration to use the current worries about vote hacking as an excuse to federalize our election system.

He’ll be joined by Tim Graham, Director of Media Analysis for Newsbusters, who will discuss the media frenzy over GOP vice presidential candidate Mike Pence declining to use the word “deplorable” in his disavowal of David Duke.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Daniel Stein, the President of the Federation for American Immigration Reform, will discuss the latest legislative information regarding the immigration debate.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will discuss North Korea conducting its fifth underground nuclear test.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
